items.question: What is VIP transfer?
items.answer: VIP transfer is a private, comfortable, and chauffeur-driven transport service. It is not shared with others.

items.question: From which airport do your vehicles operate?
items.answer: We provide transfer services from Antalya Airport to all hotels and tourist regions.

items.question: Are drinks served in the vehicle?
items.answer: Yes, our vehicles offer cold drinks and water.

items.question: Do you provide a baby seat?
items.answer: Yes. You can request it during reservation.

items.question: Are the transfer fees per person?
items.answer: No, our prices are per vehicle. It does not change depending on the number of people.

items.question: Do your drivers speak foreign languages?
items.answer: Yes, we have drivers who speak English.

items.question: Do you operate late at night?
How early should I book?
items.answer: It is recommended to book at least 12 hours in advance.

items.question: Do you refund if I cancel?
items.answer: Full refunds are made for cancellations at least 24 hours in advance.

items.question: Is there a luggage limit?
items.answer: There is a luggage capacity depending on the vehicle model. For example, a Sprinter can hold 10+ suitcases.

items.question: When will I receive the driver details?
items.answer: Driver information is sent via WhatsApp 2 hours before the transfer time.

items.question: Are your vehicles insured?
items.answer: Yes. All our vehicles and passengers are insured.
